WSServiceRoles.name: GP Admin
WSServiceRoles.description: Who has a access to ws-services

WSServiceRoles.name: Collection Operator
WSServiceRoles.description: Who has a access to ws-services,demand, bill and payment

WSServiceRoles.name: Bulk Demand Processing
WSServiceRoles.description: Who has a access to bulk demand generation,raise bill, downloa bill and receipts

WSServiceRoles.name: Expense Processing
WSServiceRoles.description: Who has a access to create and update expenses

WSServiceRoles.name: Dashbaord Viewer
WSServiceRoles.description: Who has a access to dashboard of revenue and expenditure

WSServiceRoles.name: Profile update
WSServiceRoles.description: Who has a access to update their own profile data

WSServiceRoles.name: MDMS ADMIN
WSServiceRoles.description: MDMS User that can create and search schema

WSServiceRoles.name: Sarpanch
WSServiceRoles.description: Sarpanch has access to roles like expense processing , bulk demand processing ,dashboard viewer , gp admin and  collection operator.

WSServiceRoles.name: Secretary
WSServiceRoles.description: Secretary has access to roles like expense processing , bulk demand processing ,dashboard viewer , gp admin and  collection operator.

WSServiceRoles.name: Revenue Collector
WSServiceRoles.description: Revenue Collector has access to roles like collection operator and dashboard viewer.
